scripts.start: npm run docker:start & npm run s3:start & npm run web:graphqlschema:monitor & npm run web:start & npm run graphql:start & npm run lambda:start
scripts.test: npm run graphql:test && npm run lambda:test && npm run web:test
scripts.all:install: yarn install && npm run s3:install && npm run web:install && npm run graphql:install && npm run dynamodb:install && npm run lambda:install
scripts.graphql:start: cd ./graphql && npm run start 2>&1 | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [graphql] green
scripts.lambda:start: cd ./lambda && npm run start 2>&1 | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [lambda] red
scripts.web:graphqlschema:monitor: nodemon --watch graphql/data/schema.json --exec "npm run web:graphqlschema:update" 2>&1 | node scripts/log-prefix.js [node] grey
scripts.web:start: cd ./web && npm run start 2>&1 | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [web] blue
scripts.s3:start: cd ./s3 && npm run start | node ../scripts/log-prefix.js [s3] yellow
